context: Regulation (EU) 2016/679 Article 17 — Right to erasure (‘right to be forgotten’).
question: Under what conditions can a data subject obtain erasure of personal data?

answers.text: when the personal data are no longer necessary for the purposes for which they were collected

question: Does the automatic stay apply to actions against property of the estate?

answers.text: Yes, section 362(a)(3) stays any act to obtain possession of property of the estate
